Profile.nme: Reply Location To SMS From Special Contact

Share.d: Reply to a Chosen Contact, your real-time location. Please set your keyword and ensure casing is set as required as this task is case-sensitive. You can also customise your reply.

ProfileVariable.pvd: Please select the contact that you will reply to with your location.
Please set the message that when received will trigger Tasker to send your location back to the sender. Tasker will only reply automatically with the location if this exact message is received.
Please set the reply that will be sent with the location

Action.Str: Getting location to send back to %contact...
